snippet: Two days of horse races, including Royal Delta’s victory in the Ladies’ Classic, added weight to the argument that the caliber of the Breeders’ Cup is on par with the Kentucky Derby or the Belmont Stakes.
abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column asserts that two-days of soul-stirring races at Breeders Cup adds weight to argument that caliber of racing is on par with Kentucky Derby or Belmont Stakes.
lead_paragraph: Two days of horse races, including Royal Delta’s victory in the Ladies’ Classic, added weight to the argument that the caliber of the Breeders’ Cup is on par with the Kentucky Derby or the Belmont Stakes.
